name: Tomato and Caper Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 pound tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped (or canned)
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a saucepan. Stew the tomatoes, uncovered, with the chicken stock and tomato paste until thickened. Season. Stir in the capers. Correct seasoning and serve hot with the cabbage and onion tart.
